DOC.brief_summary: The objective test acute effect different bagel contain pulse ingredient : 1 ) aerobic endurance substrate oxidation exercise 2 ) response blood glucose , insulin appetite aerobic exercise session , 3 ) food intake two hour follow exercise session . We hypothesize consumption bagel contain pulse ingredient 60 minute exercise increase aerobic endurance ( low oxygen consumption ) , decrease carbohydrate oxidation ( great respiratory quotient ) , reduction lactate production compare exercise session follow ingestion non-pulse food . We also hypothesize consumption bagel contain pulse ingredient lead low blood glucose , insulin , appetite food intake , suggest low calorie compensation , follow 60-minute aerobic exercise session compare exercise session follow ingestion non-pulse food .
DOC.criteria: Normoglycemic ( < 5.6 mmol/L ) normotensive ( systolic blood pressure < 140 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure < 90 mm Hg ) BMI 18.529.9 kg/m2 Restrained eater Regularly skip breakfast Smokers Those active ( organized activity athletic training high intensity ; â‰¥ 150 min per week moderate vigorous physical activity ) Those medication may influence study outcome experience gastrointestinal related health conditions/surgeries past year Those unable walk hour continuously
